body_html:
Okay! Is there any other way I can safely install tensorflow-gpu and work with? I am using python 2.7 right now in virtual env. I have already installed tensorflow using the link you suggested it gives the same error!
Also, is there any issue with cudnn or cuda toolkit installation?
